import React, {Component} from "react" class FormPrduct extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { file: "./static/images/burger-1.jpg", file_name: "Sin producto" } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { this.setState({ file: URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]), file_name: URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0].name) }) console.log() } render() { return (



) } } export default FormPrduct;
